LanguageData.PD_FinishedLoadingPit: Your colonists have finished throwing prisoners into the pit of despair
LanguageData.PD_ThrowPrisonerDesc: Throw a prisoner into the pit of despair. Prisoners need to be in a prison first to be thrown into the pit.
LanguageData.PD_PrisonersBeingLoaded: Prisoners are being loaded into the pit
LanguageData.PD_NoPrisonersSelected: No prisoners have been selected to be thrown into the pit
LanguageData.PD_NoSpaceInThePit: There isn't space in the pit for so many people
LanguageData.PD_NoFood: No food found to throw into the Pit
LanguageData.PD_NoFoodInThePit: Prisoners in the Pit have no food and will starve to death
LanguageData.PD_ConsecrateCthulhuDesc: Consecrate this Pit of Despair to Cthulhu. This is only a cosmetic option.
LanguageData.PD_ConsecrateBastDesc: Consecrate this Pit of Despair to Bast. This is only a cosmetic option.
LanguageData.PD_UnConsecrateDesc: Unconsecrate this Pit of Despair to keep its original appearance.
LanguageData.PD_ConsecratingCthulhu: Consecrating this Pit of Despair to Cthulhu
LanguageData.PD_ConsecratingBast: Consecrating this Pit of Despair to Bast
